>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

Youâ€™ve optimized your energy shield to protect multiple targets simultaneously. When you activate your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.xcIBsW8VL3DD9rVU]{energy shield} trick, you can create energy shields targeting a number of creatures within your melee reach equal to your one-fourth your mechanic level. Each target gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your Intelligence modifier. In addition, you distribute an additional number of temporary Hit Points equal to your mechanic level between the shielded creatures; if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.kcKUNRKT59Ql2CG5]{boost shield} trick, you instead distribute additional temporary Hit Points equal to twice your mechanic level. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.g3jkpVq5paiP7kAk]{projected shield} mechanic trick to select this trick.
